WorkItem.Description:
Well yes title says it all.
 
My Char is properly marked as Engineer in the second Profession, it also shows the Hyperspeed and Pyrorocket for Handentchants or Backenchants.
Every Filter (except disable ones) are active.
Even tried to unchekc the "Enforce Profession" in the Options.
It even was properly downloaded from the Armory.
 
And still it always says "no feet enchant choosen" if i try to optimize, and it does not show up in the lists (either Slot:Enchant>Back or simply click on the enchant line on the icon).
 
My Char is Retribution, if this helps.

Comments.Message: Movement Speed is not marked as relevant to the Retribution class, so the Nitro Boost isn't going to show up. Just leave it blank.

The Engineering Nitro Boost enchant (for boots) also gives +24 Crit rating in addition to the on use movement speed bonus which would make it relevant.

Link to Wowhead: http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=55016
And so it should be marked relevant. Thats the issue am concered about: its not marked, but should be. ;)

Rawr.Retribution now has a new system implemented for deciding relevancy. It's overall simpler that what it was, and it makes it more obvious which items will get included and which will get excluded.

Items, Enchants and buffs that have stats or special effects that are not modelled at all (such as run speed on nitroboost) will no longer cause the item to be removed.
